text: Swing is a 2010 short film on anti-smoking directed by Abhinav Kamal. The film stars Amrita Neve in the female lead. DOP of the film has been carried out by Rajesh K. The film received the Best Short Film Award in the festival Hollywood Boulevard conducted in connection with Liba Chrysalis, LIBA Chennai. The film was judged by Tamil film actor director Cheran. The film was produced by Ten Motion Arts. ==References== ==External links== * *Abhinav Kamal at Institute of Management Technology Category:2010 films Category:Indian films Category:2010s Hindi-language films
title: Swing (2010 film)
